comments_since_last_sample.body: One of my top ten fragrance. Got one from my ex when it first came out. Armani makes most of my favorites.
Never owned ADG Original but aware of its reputation, it has been on my to-get list.
I would like to be entered! I have not used ADG before but would like to have that for the next year and warmer days the rest of this year.
I love ADG, it was my teenage signature scent, but upgraded to Profumo years ago. I'd love to revisit where it all started!
I found a half full bottle of 100 ML ADG at a garage sale for $20 about 10 yrs ago. Used it everyday until it ran out. Was my absolute favorite until I started trying other scents.
ADG Profondo is my signature scent. I’d love to have the OG in my collection. Please enter me in the contest.
I’d like to be entered into the giveaway. Never smelled the original. Have tried Profumo and Profundo but wasn’t a fan of either.

I've never owned AdG but I've tried it recently with a sample and way back in the day at the mall, one of the first scents I tried when I was like 11 when it was new. I remember it rocking the fragrance world. All the 'rich' kids had it. I'd love to have the bottle.
I would like to try ADG, since its a anysituation fragrance and I just started collecting fragrances, I would like to try ADG and I believe it might  become one of my signature scent
Would love to join the giveaway and finally add adg to my routine!
